mapper.select: select t1.notifyContent,t1.notifyAction,t1.notifyTargetType,t1.notifyTarget,t1.systemCreateTime from notify_info as t1 join user_notify_info t2 on t1.notifyId = t2.notifyId where t2.userNotifyOwerId =#{userNotifyOwerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.appId=#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.notifyType=#{notifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
